description: Primes p such that x^52 = -2 has a solution mod p
comments: Complement of A216771 relative to A000040. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 17 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_]:= Reduce[Mod[x^52 + 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] =!= False; Select[Prime[Range[500]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 16 2012 *)
prog: (PARI) /* see A051071 */(MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(1100) | exists(t){x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^52 eq - 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 16 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Added more terms, Joerg Arndt, Jul 27 2011.
